review: Purchased this because, unlike the Chromecast, it has its own remote control and so doesn't suffer the same occasional disconnection issues between the tablet/device and the Chromecast.However, despite its higher spec, it drops frames and this is particularly noticeable when scenes are changing as in panning or action.  Panning scenes are always subtly jerky - the scene surges rather than smoothly pans.A direct comparison between the Fire Stick and the Chromecast (same router hardware, position, etc) shows that it is inferior for streaming quality, at least with Netflix.
